column4: hi. im using 9.04 and i created a usb startup disk by using "USB Startup Disk Creator" and chose the "persistent" thing. how come it doesnt save settings?
I don't remember the "Persistent" option in USB Startup Disk Creator.
I think USB Startup Disk Creator are the other thing.  Install Ubuntu via USB flash drives.
i'll look some more on ubuntu forums.  thank you.
